sub_title: Senior Accountant at Vivo Energy (Shell Licensee in Africa)
summary:
Experienced, brilliant and ambitious finance professional with 9+ years strong track-record of driving top financial performance. Passionate about expanding companies influence beyond the traditional role of reporting a first pass quality financial results and managing cost to identifying opportunities for top-line growth, drive profit improvement and use financial data to influence operational decision making and strategy.

I hold a Post graduate Executive master’s in Financial Management and Controls in addition to a first degree in Accounting and Finance and ACCA in view. 

I possess a large spectrum of experience in Dutch VAT, ICP and CBS reporting, financial reporting, financial forecasting, planning and analysis. I’m adept and versatile with a strong analytical skills, detailed focused with a continuous improvement mindset, self-starter with high energy level, influential leadership, result oriented and a good team player.

I am open to discuss senior leadership finance positions

profile_positions.description:
We are Vivo Energy, the company that distributes and markets Shell and Engen branded fuels and lubricants to retail and commercial customers in Africa.

We operate in 23 countries across North, West, East and Southern Africa where we have a network of over 2,000 service stations. We also export lubricants to a number of other African countries.


Key responsibilities:
Manage vendor and customer MDG
AP, AR and GRNI controls
Daily and monthly complete bank reconciliation
Process all Journal and payroll entries
Process all monthly provisions (IFRS9)
Agree monthly Intercompany positions and reconciliation 
Weekly and monthly Margin Analysis
Maintain fixed assets schedule + Lease accounting (IFRS16)
Coordinate Month and year end closing (First pass in terms of quality)
Load financial data in HFM and clear validations for reporting.
Complete balance sheet reconciliation with detailed comments and sign offs
Goal Zero reporting
Monthly financial reporting packs (IFRS and MI) with commentary.
Preparation of annual financial statement and statutory pack disclosures
Support on completion of VAT returns
Review finance KPI and put in place action plan
Planning forecasting (5 years P&L and balance sheet)
Assist with interim and year-end audit review process
Pro-actively drive process improvements and projects

Ensure accurate and Complete Financial Accounting and Reporting,
